subject: p17337033
Findings: Heart size is normal. Mediastinal widening is unchanged compatible with mediastinal lipomatosis with a tortuous aorta again noted. The hilar contours are unremarkable. Pulmonary vasculature is normal. Linear opacity within the lingula is compatible with subsegmental atelectasis. No focal consolidation, pleural effusion or pneumothorax is present. No acute osseous abnormality is identified.
